articles.author: Emma Burleigh
articles.title: Meet the grandmother living out of a 400-ft ‘granny pod’ to save money and help with child care - Fortune
articles.description: 65-year-old Denise Martin is part of a growing movement of Americans buying affordable tiny homes to live close to family and cut costs.
articles.content: Tiny bungalows are popping up in back lawns across the U.S. as more American adults welcome their grandparents home with granny pods. Denise Martin, a 65-year-old retired financial advisor and grandm… [+5514 chars]

articles.title: Rubio casts US, the 'child of Europe', as critical friend to allies - The Economic Times
